name: Blockami
description:
Blockami is a VR Multiplayer Puzzle-Battle game for the Oculus Quest, and Rift S. Utilizing Oculus' Hand-Tracking SDK!

Players can draw in 6 degrees of freedom, and compete to crush colored bricks, clearing a path to take aim at one another, using a variety of weapons and power-ups.

Blockami is a simple and classic concept, redefined by 6dof, and being able to draw shapes with your own bare hands!
